elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Intercultural sales situations" (multiple answers possible).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which of the following statements about multicultural Switzerland are true?

choices.text: The number of tourists in Switzerland is steadily decreasing.
choices.value: The number of tourists in Switzerland is steadily decreasing.

choices: Expats are considered a high-earning population group.
Persons in an ongoing asylum procedure are not allowed to work in Switzerland.
Switzerland has a high demand for foreign workers and specialists.
correctAnswer: Expats are considered a high-earning population group.
Persons in an ongoing asylum procedure are not allowed to work in Switzerland.
Switzerland has a high demand for foreign workers and specialists.

elements.name: Wie sollten die Verkaufsstrategien im Schweizer Detailhandel gestaltet sein?
choices: They should not allow themselves to be influenced by cultural diversity.
They should respond to the needs of a multicultural clientele.
They should be versatile and flexible.
They should be unchangeable so as not to confuse customers.
correctAnswer: They should respond to the needs of a multicultural clientele.
They should be versatile and flexible.

elements.name: Welche Aspekte sind in der interkulturellen Verkaufssituation zu berücksichtigen?
choices: The lifestyle and social practices of the clientele.
The economic situation in the country of origin.
The political attitude of the clientele.
Cultural differences and similarities.
correctAnswer: The lifestyle and social practices of the clientele.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Intercultural sales situations" (multiple answers possible).

elements.name: question1
elements.title: How should you greet customers who come from a different cultural background?
choices: In a foreign language.
In the local language.
With a handshake.
With a bow.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: How should you react if your customers don't understand German?
choices: Say "I'm sorry" and move on to something else.
Escort customers to the exit with a friendly smile.
Use English or another foreign language.
If necessary, involve someone from the team who speaks the customer's language.
correctAnswer: Use English or another foreign language.
If necessary, involve someone from the team who speaks the customer's language.

elements.name: Welche Kommunikationsmethoden können Sie einsetzen, wenn die verbale Verständigung schwierig ist?
choices: Show products and take/hand them over.
Use facial expressions and gestures.
Use technical aids for the translation.
Avoid eye contact.
correctAnswer: Show products and take/hand them over.
Use technical aids for the translation.
